item.title: SpotiLike
item.description: Welcome to SpotiLike My favourite project of em all. If you’re looking for my first attempt in this project(the one which requires config file typing), I suggest you head over to Version 1 Download SpotiLike Source Repo What is SpotiLike? SpotiLike is a simple application that allows you to configure custom keyboard shortcuts(hotkeys), that’s gonna let you add songs to your private playlists, or your own personal liked songs library in Spotify, while you’re listening to them.

item.title: SpotiLike v1
